dt: {bc}a raised or projecting edge or molding intended to protect or check
{bc}an underwater ridge or reef especially near the shore
{bc}one that projects from a wall of rock

dt.t: We rappelled down the cliff and reached the {wi}ledge{/wi}.

dt: {bc}rock that is solid or continuous enough to form {a_link|ledges} {bc}{sx|bedrock||}

et: Middle English {it}legge{/it} bar of a gate
shortdef: a raised or projecting edge or molding intended to protect or check
an underwater ridge or reef especially near the shore
a narrow flat surface or shelf; especially : one that projects from a wall of rock
